attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The roadworks which are underway in the town of lowestoft are causing much desruption with the residents in the town.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop Roadworks In lowestfoft."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14763.asp

Prime Minister's Office
